rule: The output must conclude by conveying the feeling the image should evoke.
input: A child releasing a balloon into a clear sky at sunset. The image should evoke hope and freedom.
output: Capture the joyful moment of a cherubic child, eyes bright with excitement, hands gently letting go of a colorful balloon as it drifts upwards in a clear evening sky tinged with hues of oranges and pinks from the setting sun. This tender scene unfolds during sunset when soft golden light bathes everything, highlighting wispy clouds that accentuate the sense of openness. The background reveals endless stretches of open space, contrasting the intimate moment between child and horizon. Convey a feeling of hope and liberation, as the balloon symbolizes releasing wishes into a vast, beautiful sky full of possibilities.
complianceText:
The output fits into a single paragraph and seems to keep under the 80-word limit. It follows the structure laid out in the description: subject with characteristics (cherubic child, bright eyes, colorful balloon), timing and lighting (evening sky, setting sun, soft golden light), background (open space, wispy clouds), and feeling (hope and liberation). No visible violations are identified.

OK
